We are Action Home Services, and we always take action for every construction service that you need. Based in Toronto, Ontario, we are a general contracting company that specializes in a wide range of services. We will help you to design and build an outside living area of your dream. Do not wait! Take action with Action Home Services. Check our website at http://actionhomeservices.ca/ to find out more. 

Our Mission
We aim to become one of the most successful construction companies within Toronto, Ontario. This mission will not happen if our services are not up to the level of what our customers are expecting. Thus our main aim is to provide the best services to our customers. Our level of professionalism will become our barometer for customer satisfaction. We also aim to make it a point to have strong ties with our customers so we can grow the level of our professionalism and gain more trust among our clients.

Our Vision
Our dream is to become the one-stop shop for any kind of construction service that any of our clients need. We initially started with interlocking and asphalt paving, but we are now venturing into other services such as landscaping, pressure washing and sealing, concreting, decks and fences, demolition services and many more. We already have a wide range of service offerings, but we are not satisfied with just these. We are excited about every project that we perform and our possibilities for improvement and additional services are endless.

Our Commitment 
We commit to do whatever it takes to achieve the level of satisfaction our customer deserves. Our workmanship will leave a lasting mark and one that will be a reminder of our professionalism and close ties with our clients. We gained the trust of our customers through hard work that pays off when we see our clients happy with the outcome of our services. We will strive to be cooperative and readily available for any queries or requests our customer needs.

M.E. Contracting is one of Toronto's premier outdoor solutions companies. 

M.E. was Founded by owners Keren and Eitan Abu, with a desire to change the face of Toronto through the revitalization of outdoor living space. The “M” and “E” stand for Keren and Eitan's daughters, Mika and Emma. From the start these two girls have inspired the vision of innovation and creativity that M.E. embodies today.

Contracting differs from other Toronto landscapers through our commitment to excellence and attention to even the smallest of details. 

Want to see for yourself? Our 7,000 square foot landscaping showroom is the only showroom in Ontario dedicated to landscaping and outdoor transformations. Our exquisite showroom encapsulates features of all the custom design elements that every home owner dreams of having in their outdoor home space. In addition to the amazing  materials we have on display, our showroom includes an in-ground swimming pool with waterfalls, outdoor kitchens and outdoor furniture for prospective clients to experience.

Our vast experience in all aspects of landscaping design and construction has provided us with the ability to take on an array of projects, both varying in shape and size. Now matter what our goal to produce astounding and exceptional work remains unchanging. We aim to go above and beyond in our passion for what we do, and as a result we aim to surpass our client’s expectations with each and every element of landscaping design.

profile:
Canada’s Gardenland is a leading domestic landscape construction and maintenance service provider in the Greater Toronto area. Our team of lawn specialists utilizes their knowledge of lawn science and their skills of artistic application to create the perfect look for your specific landscaping scenario. We understand that each property and client taste is different so we work diligently with you and your surroundings to tailor the best approach for meeting those needs. Canada’s Gardenland has both the tools and the experience available to help you bring your landscaping dream to life.
Canada’s Gardenland designs, creates, maintains and provides tools for domestic landscaping projects in the Greater Toronto area. Both artistic landscaping skills and applied lawn science is utilized in order to achieve the perfect atmosphere and our professional team works closely with clients to ensure that projects meet specific needs and requirements.

Proper landscaping requires the application of various aspects in order to make your property look its best. Therefore, Canada’s Gardenland first helps with the design and creation of the right landscaping techniques that complement the natural lay of land as well as any man-made structures on the premises. We also offer a variety of interlocking stone techniques that provide landscaping accents through beautifully designed and applied walkways, driveways and patios.

We can also apply creative outdoor lighting effects so that your landscape is transformed into a stunning sight of beauty after dark and provides safety to those visiting after hours. Quality landscaping maintenance is also offered through sod fertilization, trimming, grooming, replanting and cleaning so that your property always looks its best.

profile:
Singular Focus:

Most landscape and renovation companies try to serve many types of customers at the same time; homeowners, shopping centers, office buildings, golf courses, and the list goes on. They are pulled in all directions trying to be everything to everyone. At Captain Handy Co, we focus on one customer, you, the homeowner. We have a singular focus on bringing you the best landscaping and interior renovation, the best customer service, and the best value for your home. When you consider that quality renovation can improve the value of your home by 10%-15%, why wouldn’t you hire the one company that focuses specifically on residential landscaping? We are Your Residential Landscape and interior renovation Company.
Easy:

Our business makes your life easier. We are committed to improving the quality of life for our customers so they can spend their time on other things. Our customers are busy and have hectic lives. They do not have time to deal with different companies for lawn care, mowing, design, patio building. Captain Handy Co. offers turn-key solutions to your landscape needs. One call connects you with one of our very qualified Landscape Advisors who will make sure that you are delighted with your landscape. It is that easy.
Hassle-Free:

Ever notice how some companies make it a hassle just to do business with them? Who needs hassles? Life is complicated enough as it is. With Captain Handy Co, you can expect fast response times, clear and concise proposals, and work to be done how and when we promise it would be. You can also expect us to stand behind our work, show up when we say we will and take care of the little things that can take a landscape,renovation and experience, from blah to wow! We take away the hassles so all you have to do is enjoy your landscape.
Professional:

With 5 years under our belts, we know a thing or two about being the professional contractor of choice. Our staff has an average tenure rate of over twelve years, and some team members have been with us for over two decades! They undergo extensive and on-going training to not only assure that your renovation looks fantastic, but also to make sure that you are treated superbly. Our staff members are clearly recognizable in their sharp uniforms so you will know who is on your property. With so many companies claiming to be “professional”, isn’t it nice to work with a company that actually is?
Our Values:

At Captain Handy Co, we provide Tender Loving Care to both you and your interior and landscape renovation. These are our Values:
•	Treat people honestly, fairly and with respect in all situations
•	Create a comfortable environment in which to work and do business
•	Be open to problems and complaints, and work quickly to a fair resolution
•	Present a professional image and working safely
•	Have a “can-do” attitude
•	Stand behind our commitment to quality and service
•	Be active, responsible and positive citizens in the communities in which we work

profile:
ABOUT US

Odd Job Handyman Services began in 2008 with one man and his truck. It's since grown to be one of the largest and most reliable contractors in Toronto, serving thousands of homeowners and businesses throughout the city. On Feb. 16, 2017, it was one of five handyman services in Ontario to be officially named "Best of 2017" by Homestars, the largest network of home professionals in Canada. 

Odd Job offers a wide range of services including drywall, painting, tiling, flooring, millwork, hanging, junk removal, furniture assembly, basic plumbing & electrical and all general repairs. The work performed by Odd Job is covered by a two-year warranty. 

The staff at Odd Job is fully licensed, bonded and insured, and every member has been background-and-identity-checked. They're hand-selected from the "best of the best" in local professional circles (each with at least three positive references) and subjected to a series of in-shop tests before they're admitted into the team. 

HISTORY

It all started with Justin George, an exceptionally-handy property manager who had great difficulty convincing professional contractors to visit his building for "small jobs." Justin, a red seal tradesman, was so tired of contractors telling him "it wasn't worth their time" that he was forced to take care of most of the repairs and maintenance himself.

He realized he was far from the only person who was in this predicament. There were many people without the time, the tools or the talent to recaulk their shower stall, hang their favourite paintings or repair a few pot lights. 

Not everyone trusts the mystery men on Craigslist and Kijiji, and so Justin wanted to provide them a professional option. "It might be a small job, but it's a big deal," Justin said, "People need a company that treats it that way."

Mr. George graduated from George Brown College with a degree in mechanical engineering and from the University of Western Ontario in 2011 with a degree in technological education, manufacturing and construction. He is an Accredited Manufacturing and Construction Educator and a member in good standing of the Association of Certified Handyman Professionals (ACHP). He loves cats, guitar and building things (anything). His most important values are honesty, quality and consistency and his motto is: "There's always a way to get the job done right." 

PRICING

We offer a la carte, task-based pricing for all of our standard services. Our extensive experience has given us a tried-and-true system for evaluating the duration and cost for virtually every standard project." 

BUSINESS & PROPERTY MANAGEMENT SERVICES

Odd Job also serves many small businesses, including retail stores, office facilities and income properties. Our project manager was a longtime property manager and every member of the team has extensive experience in facilities management. Among the many businesses that trust Odd Job are Shoppers Drug Mart, Holt Renfrew, Burberry, Fresh Restaurants and LensCrafters.

Let us take care of you while you take care of business!

We began operating in April of 1992 after buying assets from Wrisco Ltd. Wrisco was a major supplier of aluminum patio covers, enclosure material and awnings for over 30 years. Our consultation starts with you. We know you’ve looked at pictures on the Internet. Perhaps it’s a neighbour’s deck that got you thinking.
